member.name: T:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.Texter
member.summary: Helper class to send text message confirmation of s to s.

member.name: M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.Texter.SendAppointmentText(System.String,Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.Staff,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary:
Sends a text confirmation of an appointment to the supplied number, utilising the Twilio NuGet package and Web API backend. The message includes appointment date and time, as well as the name and job role of the member being seen. This method expects the mobile number to be properly formatted and have the leading +44 intact; this is a requirement of the Twilio backend.
(It should be noted that at current, all texts are received by one phone number - mine. This is a restriction in Twilio's free trial service. Please don't abuse my phone number :D )
member.param: The mobile phone number to send texts to.

member.returns: The SHA256 hash value of the given string.

member.name: T:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder
M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.AddQuery(System.String)
member.summary: Adds the supplied query to pastQueries dictionary, incrementing the number of times it has been created if it already exists.

member.summary: Returns a that contain all queries, as well as how many times they have been called, formatted like so: [number_of_calls] : query_called

member.name: M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.OrderBy(System.Boolean,Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.Tables.Column[])

member.param: Whether ordering should be descending or not.
member.returns: This instance of for method chaining.

member.name: M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.Limit(System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds a Limit statement to the current SQL query. Allows results to be limited.
member.param: Number of results to limit query to.
member.returns: This instance of for method chaining.

member.name: M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.Delete(Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.Tables.Table)
member.summary: Adds a Delete From statement to the current SQL query.
member.param: The Table to be deleting from.
member.returns: This instance of for method chaining.

member.name: M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.Update(Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.Tables.Table)
member.summary: Adds an Update statement to the current SQL query. Only supports updating one table at present. This can be easily changed later, if need be. This method MUST be paired with a Where method, else will throw an exception. See the class summary for more details.
member.returns: This instance of for method chaining.

member.name: M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.Insert(Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.Tables.Table)
member.summary: Adds an Insert statement to the current SQL query.
member.param: The Table to be inserted into.
member.returns: This instance of for method chaining.

member.name: M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.Values(System.Object[])
member.summary: Adds a Values statement to the current SQL query. There are two ways to perform an insert in SQL - the first is to specify both column name and value, which allows you to leave some values out and have them default. The second is to not specify column names, but instead specify all values in the correct order. This method uses the latter, so ensure you supply ALL values for the given Table, and that they are the correct data type.
member.param: The s that will be used as values to insert into Table.
member.returns: This instance of for method chaining.

member.name: M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.Set(System.Object[])
member.summary: Adds a Set statement to the current SQL query. A word of warning for the parameters: to satisfy SQL, they must be pairs of and value. However, there is no way to enforce this and still have the amount supplied be variable (without creating a , or something similar), so please ensure you supply a and a value.
member.param: A variable length object array () that correspond to pairs of and values to be inserted into said column in the database.
member.returns: This instance of for method chaining.

member.name: M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.GetSelectedColumns
member.summary: Returns the that have been used in a Select method.
member.returns: A .

member.name: M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.Select(Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.Tables.Column[])
member.summary: Adds a Select statement to the current SQL query.
member.param: A to be selected from the database tables.
member.returns: This instance of for method chaining.

member.name: M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.TrimQuery(System.Int32)
member.summary: Convenience method to quickly trim the query string down by a specified amount of characters. Used to remove trailing characters such as commas from the ends of statements.
member.param: The amount of characters to trim from the end of the query string.

member.name: M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.From(Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.Tables.Table[])
member.summary: Adds a From statement to the current SQL query.
member.param: The tables to be used in the From statement.
member.returns: This instance of for method chaining.

member.name: M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.Where(Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.WhereClass[])
member.summary: Adds a Where statement to the current SQL query. This method takes a list of WhereClass instances as it's parameter.
member.param: The instances to add to this query.
member.returns: This instance of for method chaining.

member.name: M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.And
member.summary: A for an SQL And statement. To be used in conjunction with a Where method.
member.returns: A representing the SQL And statement.

member.name: M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.Or
member.summary: A for an SQL Or statement. To be used in conjunction with a Where method.
member.returns: A representing the SQL Or statement.

member.name: M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.IsEqual(Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.Tables.Column,System.Object)
member.summary: A for an SQL equals check. To be used in conjunction with a Where method. Takes a and an .
member.returns: A that represents the equality check in SQL.

member.name: M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.IsLessThan(Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.Tables.Column,System.Object)
member.summary: A for an SQL less than check. To be used in conjunction with a Where method. Takes a and an .
member.returns: A that represents the less than statement in SQL.

member.name: M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.IsLessThanEqual(Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.Tables.Column,System.Object)
member.summary: A for an SQL less than or equal check. To be used in conjunction with a Where method. Takes a and an .
member.returns: A that represents the less than or equal statement in SQL.

member.name: M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.IsMoreThan(Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.Tables.Column,System.Object)
member.summary: A for an SQL more than check. To be used in conjunction with a Where method. Takes a and an .
member.returns: A that represents the more than statement in SQL.

member.name: M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.IsMoreThanEqual(Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.Tables.Column,System.Object)
member.summary: A for an SQL more than or equal to check. To be used in conjunction with a Where method. Takes a and an .
member.returns: A that represents the more than or equal to statement in SQL.

member.name: M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.ToString
member.summary: Adds a semicolon to the finished query, and adds the query to the running list of queries performed. Checks to see if an Update statement is present without a Where statement, and throws a if so.
member.returns: A valid SQL query string.
member.exception: This exception is thrown if an Update statement without a matching Where statement.

member.name: T:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.WhereClass
member.summary: Simple class to be used as the parameters of the method, to ensure that at no point are we creating queries purely using s.

member.name: T:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.MalformedUpdateQueryException
member.summary: Exception that is thrown if an Update statement is found without a matching Where statement.

member.name: M:Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder.DumpLog
member.summary: Dumps the stored queries that have been requested over the program lifetime, and how many times they have been requested. Outputs this information to and a text file named querylog.txt in the same folder as the exe.

member.summary: Inserts the supplied Prescription into the database. It's important to note that the Prescription must have a valid id, obtained using the GetNextAvailableID() method in this class. Any Prescriptions that have MedicationInstances linked to them will need to be inserted before the MedicationInstances are to avoid foreign key constraint problems.

member.summary: Inserts the member into the Rota table, defaulting all days to 0 (entire week off).

member.name: T:Mockup2.Factories.StaffFactory
member.summary: Convenience class to handle returning, updating, and inserting Staff objects into the database.

member.name: M:Mockup2.Factories.StaffFactory.#ctor(Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.DBConnection)
member.summary: Calls GetLatestStaffID() to ensure objects are created witha valid ID.
member.param: The instance of we are using.

member.name: M:Mockup2.Factories.StaffFactory.RemoveStaffByID(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the member associated with the given Staff ID.

member.name: M:Mockup2.Factories.StaffFactory.GetLatestStaffID
member.summary: Sets the next available staff ID.

member.name: M:Mockup2.Factories.StaffFactory.GetNextAvailableStaffID
member.summary: Gets the next available staff ID. Useful when you need to know the staff ID before pushing the staff object into the database, for example when you are adding a new staff member to both the staff table and the rota table. Otherwise, you would have to push the staff member into the staff table, then pull them out again to see which ID the database assigned them.
member.returns: An integer automatically set to be a valid staff ID that doesn't clash.

member.name: M:Mockup2.Factories.StaffFactory.GetStaffByID(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a list of Staff by their ID number. This method should only return a list of size one, but that is not guranteed.
member.param: ID of the staff member to look for.
member.returns: A list of Staff.

member.name: M:Mockup2.Factories.StaffFactory.GetStaff(Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder)
member.summary: Returns a list of Staff objects based on search critera given the QueryBuilder.
member.returns: A list of staff.

member.name: M:Mockup2.Factories.StaffFactory.GetStaffByName(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Return a list of Staff members by their first and last name.
member.returns: A list of Staff objects.

member.name: M:Mockup2.Factories.StaffFactory.GetStaff
member.summary: Convenience method to get all Staff members from the database.
member.returns: A list of all Staff

member.name: T:Mockup2.Factories.TestResultFactory
member.summary: Convenience class to handle returning, updating, and inserting TestResult objects into the database.

member.summary: Get a list of TestResult objects based on search criteria given the QueryBuilder.

member.summary: Convenience method to get all

member.name: T:Mockup2.Factories.PatientFactory
member.summary: Convenience class to handle pulling Patients from, and inserting Patients into, the database. As well as updating them.

member.name: M:Mockup2.Factories.PatientFactory.InsertPatient(Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.Patient)
member.summary: Inserts the given information into the database.

member.name: M:Mockup2.Factories.PatientFactory.UpdatePatient(Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.Patient)
member.summary: Updates the given information in the database.
member.param: The to get updated information from.

member.name: M:Mockup2.Factories.PatientFactory.GetPatients(Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder)
member.summary: Returns a list of s based on certain search criteria, provided by the QueryBuilder SQL code.
member.param: QueryBuilder containing the SQL query to run.
member.returns: A list of objects.

member.name: M:Mockup2.Factories.PatientFactory.DeletePatient(Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.Patient)
member.summary: Delete an entry from the Patient table in the database, based on information given by the object.

member.name: M:Mockup2.Factories.PatientFactory.GetPatientsByName(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Conveience method to get all s by their first and last name. Most of the time, this method is expected to return a list containing only one value. However, this cannot be guranteed as name collisions cannot be prevented. Similarly, it shouln't be assumed this method will always return at least one entry - sometimes it doesn't, if the patient cannot be found.
member.returns: A list of s that have the first and last name provided. Size of the list may be more than 1, or 0.

member.name: M:Mockup2.Factories.PatientFactory.GetPatientsByID(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a by their Id number.
member.returns: A list of s that match the ID. Should have a size of 1 almost always, but is a list just in case.

member.name: M:Mockup2.Factories.PatientFactory.GetAPatientByID(System.Int32)
member.summary: This method returns a singel patient object from the database by ID

member.name: M:Mockup2.Factories.PatientFactory.GetPatientByIdNumber(Mockup2.DatabaseClasses.QueryBuilder)
member.summary: This method returns a single patient from the database Takes a querybuilder

member.name: M:Mockup2.Factories.PatientFactory.GetPatients
member.summary: Convenience method to return all s currently stored in the database.
member.returns: A list of all s.

members.member: returns a patient object by finding it in the database by first and last name
Executes query in the database to return details to getAPatient() method
Objects and variables used on the page
initialises constructor include time,database components
Form Initialises a next patient and database components
This button returns one patient from the database as an object can be by name or nhs number
This method is created to clear the from from data
This button (View this patient details) loads in selected patient details on the page
This function returns all prescription details that belongs to the current patient
This function returns prescription object that is currently loaded with current patient this function is specific and return a specific value
This method returns a prescription list as a string therefore its useable in the listbox
This function reads the testresults from the object list and returns it as a string This function is not global but specified to test name and testdate
This function initialises current patient to the patient who has been searched and selecet in the searchbox
This function swaps the current patient to the next patient from next or from search
Prinitg any list data into the textbox
Prinitg any list data into the textbox
This function initalises the next patient when an appointment is booked for the day
Clears selected textbox
Clears selected textbox
Clears selected textbox
This function clears all the listboxes present on this form
This method displays the note in the medical history box after added
Saves the note into a string array that prepares the note to be saved in the database changes only apply when the current patient changes are saved through save() method
This is the removes modified changes from the medical history that has been added currently
prompting the user to save their work (curently loaded patient)
Loads the next patient who has been labeled by this button this button also saves the currently loaded patient before the next patient loaded onto the form
The exit button leaves the form and asks to save a patient who currently loaded onto the form
gets the date and time now but only shows current time of the system
Initialised a clock on the form
Timer is running ad refreshing the form (checks for patient when time passes)
Timer action update time and next patient
Allows double clik on the patient who has been searched from the database when double clik action occurs then the patient will be loaded onto the form
Double click on the testresults box allows to read a prescription object with more detail

Fills up the listbox from the prescription list and displays it in the prescription listbox editIndex and selected prescriptions variables are global and changing whenever the user selects a valid index from the listbox
Translates a validated index to and adds it as a the currently used item
allows prescription management double click to read object
Updtas modified data in the prescription list
Allow prescription in the prescrioption list to be repeated
Changes the is repeateable to false repeate not allowed
saves the modified prescrioption
Changes the true or false where the prescription is repeatable
AddButton calls the prescription form to create a new prescirption
